thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com
thread.title: Gerry Tischler

author: Gerry Tischler
title: Gerry Tischler
text: The first contact that I made with them was for someone to repair my refrigerator, which had stopped working. The repairman was here within 35 minutes. The second was for someone to wash the outside of my windows. He was here when promised and did a very good job. In the past I had used Angie's List and had several bad experiences. My son suggested that I try Homeadvisor and I am glad that I did.
